channel.title: Need Anti Spam Please
channel.description:
Well some guy is spamming "l.a.u.g.h.i.n.g. m.a.n. f.o.r.e.v.e.r" on ::yell and in that chat. The problem is I can't mute, ipban or ban him. Some how he avoids it. His name has a "£" in it which you can't type in-game which means you can't type his name to ban or kick.
Please tell me how to type £ in-game or a anti spam script that only lets you talk every 5 seconds and if you get blocked 5 times you get auto banned.
Regards SGC

item.title: Need Anti Spam Please
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

Maybe you shouldn’t allow people to register names with £ and avoid the problem altogether.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Anti Spam Please
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Try adding time delays on it which will reduce it drastically.

Also, you could create a new rank for that character and make sure that rank can’t use that command.

To type £, you’ll need an English keyboard input. Add it via your control panel and regional and language options.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Anti Spam Please
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“darscape, post:2, topic:280983”]How about not letting players use ::say at all.

Problem solved[/quote]

rs2 probebly ::yell

Read full topic
